analysis.description:
TokenERC20 (/unique_chucks/5/0x121c6e0613317a98cc14a9d379e2abe546ba980c.sol#231-388) has incorrect ERC20 function interface(s):
	-transfer (/unique_chucks/5/0x121c6e0613317a98cc14a9d379e2abe546ba980c.sol#298-301)

Reentrancy in PELOCoinToken._transfer (/unique_chucks/5/0x121c6e0613317a98cc14a9d379e2abe546ba980c.sol#622-651):
	External calls:
	- peloExtenstion.Operation(1,(bytes32(_from),bytes32(_to),bytes32(_value),bytes32(balanceOf[_from]),bytes32(balanceOf[_to]),bytes32(0),bytes32(0),bytes32(0))) (/unique_chucks/5/0x121c6e0613317a98cc14a9d379e2abe546ba980c.sol#634-635)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- balanceOf (/unique_chucks/5/0x121c6e0613317a98cc14a9d379e2abe546ba980c.sol#635-638)
	- balanceOf (/unique_chucks/5/0x121c6e0613317a98cc14a9d379e2abe546ba980c.sol#639)
data in PELOCoinToken.insertNewUser (/unique_chucks/5/0x121c6e0613317a98cc14a9d379e2abe546ba980c.sol#601) is a local variable never initialiazed

PELOCoinToken._transfer (/unique_chucks/5/0x121c6e0613317a98cc14a9d379e2abe546ba980c.sol#622-651) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-peloExtenstion.Operation(1,(bytes32(_from),bytes32(_to),bytes32(_value),bytes32(balanceOf[_from]),bytes32(balanceOf[_to]),bytes32(0),bytes32(0),bytes32(0))) (/unique_chucks/5/0x121c6e0613317a98cc14a9d379e2abe546ba980c.sol#634-635)
	-peloExtenstion.Operation(2,(bytes32(_from),bytes32(_to),bytes32(_value),bytes32(balanceOf[_from]),bytes32(balanceOf[_to]),bytes32(0),bytes32(0),bytes32(0))) (/unique_chucks/5/0x121c6e0613317a98cc14a9d379e2abe546ba980c.sol#648-651)

Reentrancy in PELOCoinToken.insertNewUser (/unique_chucks/5/0x121c6e0613317a98cc14a9d379e2abe546ba980c.sol#596-618):
	External calls:
	- _transfer(msg.sender,_ethAddr,amount) (/unique_chucks/5/0x121c6e0613317a98cc14a9d379e2abe546ba980c.sol#616)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- numMembers (/unique_chucks/5/0x121c6e0613317a98cc14a9d379e2abe546ba980c.sol#617-618)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/5/0x121c6e0613317a98cc14a9d379e2abe546ba980c.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.19 (/unique_chucks/5/0x121c6e0613317a98cc14a9d379e2abe546ba980c.sol#1): it allows old versions
